TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SessionStateSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class SessionStateSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定 Web 應用程式的工作階段狀態。

span.span: Configures the session state for a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是指由 Machine.config 或 Web.config 組態檔中的項目`sessionState`標記。The class refers to the element in the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file identified by the `sessionState` tag. 當新的用戶端開始與 Web 應用程式互動時，工作階段識別碼是發出及相關聯工作階段是有效的時間內從相同的用戶端的所有後續要求。When a new client begins interacting with a Web application, a session ID is issued and associated with all the subsequent requests from the same client during the time that the session is valid. 這個識別碼用來維護跨要求與用戶端工作階段相關聯的伺服器端狀態。This ID is used to maintain server-side state associated with the client session across requests. 控制 ASP.NET 應用程式會建立及維護每個用戶端代表這個關聯的方式。The controls how the ASP.NET application establishes and maintains this association on behalf of each client. 這項機制非常具有彈性，讓您能夠跨處理序，而不使用 cookie，以及其他項目追蹤狀態，主機工作階段狀態資訊。This mechanism is very flexible and gives you the ability to host session-state information out of process and to track state without using cookies, among other things. ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值`sessionState`區段，也可以做為成員的存取類別。The first demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `sessionState` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 第二個示範如何使用類別。The second demonstrates how to use the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定值`sessionState`> 一節。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `sessionState` section. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當值設定為`true`，ASP.NET 會使用來壓縮和展開工作階段狀態資料的類別。When the value is set to `true`, ASP.NET uses the class to compress and expand session-state data.

span.span: if all requests are treated as cookieless, or if no requests are treated as cookieless, or one of the values.

value.span: ASP.NET 2.0 版中的預設值為 。

span.span: The default value in ASP.NET version 2.0 is .

value.span: 舊版中的預設值為 。

span.span: In earlier versions, the default value was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作階段狀態可以儲存將用戶端與伺服器工作階段相關聯的唯一識別碼的兩種方法： 將 HTTP cookie 儲存在用戶端上，或編碼在 URL 中的工作階段識別碼。There are two ways that session state can store the unique ID that associates the client with a server session: by storing an HTTP cookie on the client or by encoding the session ID in the URL. 在 cookie 中儲存的工作階段識別碼為更安全，但要求的用戶端瀏覽器支援 cookie。Storing the session ID in the cookie is more secure but requires the client browser to support cookies. 允許不支援各種不同的行動裝置，例如 cookie 的用戶端的應用程式的工作階段識別碼可能會儲存在 URL 中。For applications that allow clients that do not support cookies, such as a variety of mobile devices, the session ID may be stored in the URL. URL 選項有幾個缺點。The URL option has several drawbacks. 它需要站台上的連結是相對值，而且頁面重新導向新的查詢字串值的工作階段的開頭，並公開工作階段識別碼右側的查詢字串，其中它可以會挑選用於安全性攻擊。It requires that the links on the site be relative and that the page be redirected at the beginning of the session with new query-string values, and it exposes the session ID right in the query string, where it can be picked up for use in a security attack. 您是鼓勵使用 cookie 模式只有在必須支援缺少 cookie 支援的用戶端。You are encouraged to use the cookieless mode only if you need to support clients that lack cookie support. 工作階段狀態也支援另外兩個選項：和。Session state also supports two additional options: and . 前者可讓工作階段狀態模組判斷何種模式下 (cookie 或 cookie) 適用於以根據瀏覽器功能的每個用戶端為基礎。The former enables the session-state module to determine what mode (cookie or cookieless) is used on a per-client basis based on the browser capabilities. 選項會執行與驗證 cookie 是否可能會儲存，並因此需要額外的要求來作決定瀏覽器在交握。The option performs a handshake with the browser to verify whether a cookie may be stored, and therefore requires an additional request to make the determination. 如果您需要支援 cookie 的用戶端，強烈建議考慮使用產生僅為需要這些用戶端的 cookie 的 Url。If you need to support cookieless clients, strongly consider using to generate cookieless URLs only for clients that require them. > [!NOTE] > 含有。瀏覽器 4.1 或最多。瀏覽器 3.2、一律行為如同值屬性物件是`false`，除非屬性中的Web.config 區段已明確設定為`true`.With UP.Browser 4.1 or UP.Browser 3.2, always behaves as if the value of the property of the object is `false`, unless the property in the section of Web.config has been explicitly set to `true`. > > 在 ASP.NET 1.1 版中，此設定的選項已`true`或`false`，但與 ASP.NET 2.0 中，選擇會展開，和現在是預設值。In ASP.NET version 1.1, the options for this setting were `true` or `false`, but with ASP.NET 2.0, the choices are expanded, and is now the default setting. 如果您的 Web 應用程式具有屬性設為布林值，則應該可正常運作的這些瀏覽器。If your Web application has the property set to a Boolean value, then should work as expected for these browsers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題以了解如何存取物件。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不必要的屬性，而且可以從組態階層架構中較高層級或預設值繼承。The is not a required attribute and can be inherited from a higher level in the configuration hierarchy or from the default value. 不過，本章節的組態處理常式會一律會寫出以目前繼承的值時，寫入此區段的模式。However, the configuration handler for this section will always write out the mode based on the current inherited value when writing this section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題以了解如何存取物件。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定儲存工作階段狀態的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying where to store the session state.

span.span: A value specifying where to store the session state, or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定屬性，屬性和屬性會被忽略。If the property is specified, the property and property are ignored. 可以透過鎖定屬性內的其他屬性視為[工作階段狀態項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)項目。The can be locked via the property like other properties within the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element. 所傳回的連接字串將每個要求用來連接到適當的伺服器位置的其餘部分的要求。The connection string returned by the will be used on every request to connect to the appropriate server location for the remainder of the request. 如果連接字串無效，ASP.NET 會擲回相同的伺服器設定的連接字串無效時擲回的例外狀況。If the connection string is invalid, ASP.NET will throw the same exception that is thrown when the configured connection string to the server is invalid. 這個屬性用來在多個後端節點的工作階段狀態資料分割時以 SQL 或狀態伺服器模式。This property is used to partition session-state data across multiple backend nodes when in SQL or state-server mode.

span.span: The time interval that should elapse before ASP.NET reconnects to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 發生連接錯誤時，重新連接至資料庫之前的秒數中指定的時間間隔。The specifies the time interval in seconds before reconnecting to the database when a connection error has occurred.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 連接字串。

value.span: SQL 連接字串。

value.span: 其預設值為泛型字串："data source=127.0.0.1;Integrated Security=SSPI"

span.span: Its default value is the generic string: "data source=127.0.0.1;Integrated Security=SSPI"

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`sqlConnectionString`屬性時，需要設。This `sqlConnectionString` attribute is required when is set to . > [!NOTE] > 若要使用工作階段狀態模式，您必須執行 InstallSqlState.sql SQL 指令碼 (它安裝在 [*磁碟機*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*預設的.NET Framework 安裝的一部分） 的電腦上執行 SQL Server 儲存工作階段狀態。To use the session state mode, you must run the InstallSqlState.sql SQL script (which is installed in [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber* as part of the default .NET Framework installation) on the computer running SQL Server that will store the session state. 這會建立新的預存程序稱為 ASPState 資料庫和 TempDB 資料庫中建立新的 ASPStateTempApplications 和 ASPStateTempSessions 資料表。This creates a database called ASPState with new stored procedures and creates new ASPStateTempApplications and ASPStateTempSessions tables in the TempDB database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題以了解如何存取物件。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#8)]

span.span: Gets or sets the state server connection string.

value.span: 狀態伺服器連接字串。

span.span: The state server connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定當工作階段狀態儲存在遠端伺服器名稱和連接埠。This property specifies the server name and the port when the session state is stored remotely. `stateConnectionString`屬性時，需要設。The `stateConnectionString` attribute is required when the is set to . > [!NOTE] > 請確定 ASP.NET 狀態服務正在執行的工作階段狀態資訊會儲存在遠端伺服器上。Make sure the ASP.NET state service is running on the remote server that stores the session-state information. 此服務已安裝 asp.net，且位於預設位置 [*磁碟機*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*\aspnet_state.exe。This service is installed with ASP.NET and is located by default at [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*\aspnet_state.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題以了解如何存取物件。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan StateNetworkTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.StateNetworkTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 伺服器和狀態伺服器之間，網路連接可以維持閒置的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time the network connection between the Web server and the state server can remain idle.

value.span: 在 Web 伺服器和狀態伺服器之間，網路連接可在放棄工作階段之前維持閒置的時間，以秒為單位。

span.span: The time, in seconds, that the network connection between the Web server and the state server can remain idle before the session is abandoned.

value.span: 預設值為 10 秒。

span.span: The default value is 10 seconds.

summary.span: 取得或設定工作階段逾時

span.span: Gets or sets the session time-out

value.span: 工作階段逾時，以分鐘為單位。

span.span: The session time-out, in minutes.

value.span: 預設值是 20 分鐘。

span.span: The default value is 20 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性無法設定的值大於 525,601 分鐘 （1 年）。The property cannot be set to a value greater than 525,601 minutes (1 year). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題以了解如何存取物件。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object.
